RumorFact.Text: An anglerfish skeleton on Green Base told me he has friends on Dried Tears.

ExploreFact.Text: An anglerfish on Dried Tears spoke to me in my head.

RumorFact.Text: Strum mentioned there is a scroll somewhere on Dried Tears.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a scroll held by a Nomai skeleton on Dried Tears. It recounts a conversation about a frozen civilization.
Reson mentioned that the citizens are bipedal and had antlers on their heads.
Reson volunteered his team to investigate the planet further.
The planet does not support the necessary conditions to freeze over. This contradiction was an emphasis in the research.
